sentences.en: A circuit whose elements are films of a few molecules thick, formed on aninsulating substrate.
sentences.cn: 一种电路,它的元件是在绝缘基片上形成的几个分子厚的膜.

sentences.en: A highly localized, specialized piece of substrate is densely overgrown.
sentences.cn: 菌体稠密地长满了一小块高度局限的特化的基质上.

sentences.en: A planar film of refractive index nf is sandwiched between a substrate and a cover material.
sentences.cn: 折射率为nf的平面薄膜夹在折射率较低的衬底和覆盖层之间.

sentences.en: After reflow, carefully remove substrate with components and allow to cool.
sentences.cn: 回流后, 仔细拿开带组件的基板,并使之冷却.

sentences.en: As chemical precursors stream onto the surface of a rolling metal or plastic substrate, they react with one another to form a network of nanoparticles.
sentences.cn: 各化学母质流向滚动中的金属或塑料基片的表面，他们互相作用，形成一层纳米级微粒网状结构。

sentences.en: Fundamentally, these paradigms can be (and are) built on top of a substrate of threads and locks, but they create higher level abstractions that push much of that complexity down.
sentences.cn: 从根本上讲，这些范例可以（且是）构建于线程和锁的基底之上，但是它们创建降低复杂度的更高的抽象级别。

sentences.en: Glutamine rather than ammonia may be the preferential substrate.
sentences.cn: 谷酰胺可能是比氨还要合适的底物.

sentences.en: Many bacteria can thrive upon very simple substrate.
sentences.cn: 很多细菌在很简单的基质中也能很好地繁殖.

sentences.en: Pigments that retard to the corrosion in the substrate.
sentences.cn: 能够延缓基材腐蚀的一种颜料.

sentences.en: Succinate was the most effective substrate in following oxygen consumption.
sentences.cn: 琥珀酸盐在以后的氧消耗中是最有效的基质.

sentences.en: The crown - rust fungus has changed continuously in response to the living substrate provided by man.
sentences.cn: 冠锈菌随着人们所提供的生活基物而不断变化.

sentences.en: The effect of substrate temperature on the accumulation of disorder is substantial.
sentences.cn: 衬底温度对于无序区积累的影响是很显著的.

sentences.en: The element employs a bifilar wound wire grid on an insulating substrate.
sentences.cn: 元件系用双股绕线网缠绕在一块绝缘基板上.

sentences.en: The first requirement for any adhesive bond is that the adhesive most wet the substrate.
sentences.cn: 对所有粘结剂粘结的首先要求,就是必须能浸润基材.

sentences.en: The gardener talked about the proper substrate for acid - loving plants.
sentences.cn: 园艺师讨论了适合喜酸性植物的土层.

sentences.en: The rate of substrate change is dependent of substrate concentration.
sentences.cn: 被酶作用物变化速率取决于被酶作用物的浓度.

sentences.en: This means that a file system would serve as a reasonable substrate for a synchronization database.
sentences.cn: 这意味着文件系统作为同步数据库的底层支持是合情合理的。

sentences.en: We shall consider the case of a flat substrate first.
sentences.cn: 我们首先考虑平面基底的情况.

words.tran_cn: 基质；基片；底层（等于substratum）；酶作用物

phrases.tran_cn: 陶瓷；陶瓷基片；陶瓷衬底

trans.tran_en: the substance upon which an enzyme acts
